availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John L. Magee (Cynthiana, Harrison County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Ann McIntosh Magee in Harrison County, Kentucky, on September 11, 1844. Father of Henry M. Magee and George L. Magee. Merchant in Harrison County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Harrison County in 1850. Merchant in Harrison County in 1860. Retailer in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 57A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 2.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 566.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 15, Harrison County, Kentucky, 1863, p. 134.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film 000216896, p. 130.
"John L. Magee (1815-1883)," Find A Grave, Memorial 43077138, accessed April 14, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43077138.
